item.title: A fresh start
item.description: After a decade-long hiatus, I've made the decision to revive my blog about my passion for technology and to share my experiences. Moreover, this site serves as my personal wiki, a digital repository where I document the tools and insights integral to my daily life as a technical consultant."

item.title: Adding favicons to external links in MkDocs
item.description: I've developed a MkDocs plugin called mkdocs-link-favicon, designed to facilitate the automatic generation of a favicon before each external link. You can observe the functionality of this plugin on this website.

item.title: Language bar not showing on GitHub repository
item.description: I recently encountered an issue with my GitHub repository, mkdocs-link-favicon, where the language bar was not being generated. After some investigation, I discovered that GitHub uses a library called Linguist to create language breakdown graphs, and these graphs are recalculated every time changes are pushed to a repository. You can find more details on this process here.
